alert.note: Alert for Jones; Pamlico (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 07 at 9:49PM EDT until August 08 at 12:00AM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM EDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JONES...CRAVEN...WEST CENTRAL HYDE...ONSLOW... SOUTHERN BEAUFORT...CENTRAL CARTERET AND PAMLICO COUNTIES... At 949 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Edward to Hubert to Sneads Ferry, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, New Bern, Havelock, Morehead City, North Topsail Beach, Newport, Pumpkin Center, New River Station, Half Moon, Camp Lejeune Center, Piney Green, James City, Trent Woods, River Bend, Stella, Swansboro, Hubert, South River, Cape Carteret and Merrimon. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please send your reports of hail and/or wind damage, including trees or large limbs downed, by calling the National Weather Service office in Newport at 1-800-889-6889.
